fields.name: 0.1.7 release notes
fields.content: Version 0.1.7 streamlines the release workflow with a migration snapshot script, fixture checks, automatic fixture commits, and PyPI validation tools alongside stability fixes.

fields.name: 0.1.4 release notes
fields.content: Version 0.1.4 adds a request approval system and admin favorites, moves releases to fixtures, and improves database refresh with a clean flag and deduplicated future actions.

fields.name: 0.1.1 release notes
fields.content: The 0.1.1 release debuts the arts gallery and invitation templates, adds a public charger landing page with QR links, and introduces certificate renewal scripts and hardware integration enhancements.
